title: Questions to Ask a Girl over Text: 70+ Flirty, Funny & Deep Examples

steps.title: What’s been the highlight of your day?
steps.content: What’s been the highlight of your day?

steps.title: Eat anything delicious (or awful) today? 😋
steps.content: Eat anything delicious (or awful) today? 😋

steps.title: What’s a funny thing that happened to you today?
steps.content: What’s a funny thing that happened to you today?

steps.title: What was the last thing that made you laugh?
steps.content: What was the last thing that made you laugh?

steps.title: Working on anything awesome today?
steps.content: Working on anything awesome today?

steps.title: Did anything make you smile today?
steps.content: Did anything make you smile today?

steps.title: What should I watch on TV tonight?
steps.content: What should I watch on TV tonight?

steps.title: What app do you think I should download on my phone?
steps.content: What app do you think I should download on my phone?

steps.title: What’s the best piece of advice you’ve ever gotten?
steps.content: What’s the best piece of advice you’ve ever gotten?

steps.title: Help! Which shirt should I wear this weekend?
steps.content: Help! Which shirt should I wear this weekend?

steps.title: What are some good questions to ask to learn more about you?
steps.content: What are some good questions to ask to learn more about you?

steps.title: What’s your favorite type of conversation to have with someone?
steps.content: What’s your favorite type of conversation to have with someone?

steps.title: Okay, I’ll answer any 3 questions with total honesty. Ready?
steps.content: Okay, I’ll answer any 3 questions with total honesty. Ready?

steps.title: Anything weighing on your mind right now? Feel free to use me as a sounding board!
steps.content: Anything weighing on your mind right now? Feel free to use me as a sounding board!

steps.title: What’s the most eye-catching photo on your camera roll right now?
steps.content: What’s the most eye-catching photo on your camera roll right now?

steps.title: What’s the goofiest selfie you’ve ever taken? I’ll show you mine if you show me yours.
steps.content: What’s the goofiest selfie you’ve ever taken? I’ll show you mine if you show me yours.

steps.title: Look at this cool pic I took on my walk today! Do you have any fun photos to share?
steps.content: Look at this cool pic I took on my walk today! Do you have any fun photos to share?

steps.title: I am absolutely DYING to see a puppy pic! Could you send your cutest photo?
steps.content: I am absolutely DYING to see a puppy pic! Could you send your cutest photo?

steps.title: What kind of trouble are you getting into today? 😉
steps.content: What kind of trouble are you getting into today? 😉

steps.title: When are you free? Want to go on a little adventure?
steps.content: When are you free? Want to go on a little adventure?

steps.title: Are you doing anything fun this weekend? Got a little time for me?
steps.content: Are you doing anything fun this weekend? Got a little time for me?

steps.title: How about dinner at my place tomorrow?
steps.content: How about dinner at my place tomorrow?

steps.title: Got any travel plans in the future?
steps.content: Got any travel plans in the future?

steps.title: What’s the lamest pickup line you’ve ever been given?
steps.content: What’s the lamest pickup line you’ve ever been given?

steps.title: Ever do something weird to grab someone’s attention?
steps.content: Ever do something weird to grab someone’s attention?

steps.title: What’s the wildest and most exciting thing you’ve ever done?
steps.content: What’s the wildest and most exciting thing you’ve ever done?

steps.title: What’s the most bizarre dream you’ve ever had?
steps.content: What’s the most bizarre dream you’ve ever had?

steps.title: If you could have a single superpower, what would it be?
steps.content: If you could have a single superpower, what would it be?

steps.title: What are 3 things you’d bring to a desert island?
steps.content: What are 3 things you’d bring to a desert island?

steps.title: If you were an actress, what kind of movies would you star in?
steps.content: If you were an actress, what kind of movies would you star in?

steps.title: A genie gives you a wish. What do you wish for?
steps.content: A genie gives you a wish. What do you wish for?

steps.title: Would you rather your only mode of transportation be a donkey or a giraffe?
steps.content: Would you rather your only mode of transportation be a donkey or a giraffe?

steps.title: Quick: what are your top 5 movies?
steps.content: Quick: what are your top 5 movies?

steps.title: Who are your favorite artists?
steps.content: Who are your favorite artists?

steps.title: What’s the coolest place you’ve ever visited and why?
steps.content: What’s the coolest place you’ve ever visited and why?

steps.title: What’s one thing you’re absolutely obsessed with?
steps.content: What’s one thing you’re absolutely obsessed with?

steps.title: What’s your favorite thing to do in your free time?
steps.content: What’s your favorite thing to do in your free time?

steps.title: What would you say is your strongest skill?
steps.content: What would you say is your strongest skill?

steps.title: How’s your big project going? It sounded so cool the last time we talked!
steps.content: How’s your big project going? It sounded so cool the last time we talked!

steps.title: What kind of things were you into as a kid?
steps.content: What kind of things were you into as a kid?

steps.title: Where’d you go to school? College?
steps.content: Where’d you go to school? College?

steps.title: Where’s your hometown? Did you like growing up there?
steps.content: Where’s your hometown? Did you like growing up there?

steps.title: Got any siblings? What are they like?
steps.content: Got any siblings? What are they like?

steps.title: What country would your dream job be in?
steps.content: What country would your dream job be in?

steps.title: What’s on your bucket list?
steps.content: What’s on your bucket list?

steps.title: What would you do if you were guaranteed to succeed?
steps.content: What would you do if you were guaranteed to succeed?

steps.title: What are 3 places you want to live in?
steps.content: What are 3 places you want to live in?

steps.title: Is your hotness the real cause of global warming? 🔥
steps.content: Is your hotness the real cause of global warming? 🔥

steps.title: Are you tired after running through my dreams all last night?
steps.content: Are you tired after running through my dreams all last night?

steps.title: I think I need a late-night snack. Can I have you?
steps.content: I think I need a late-night snack. Can I have you?

steps.title: Has anyone told you how gorgeous you look today?
steps.content: Has anyone told you how gorgeous you look today?

steps.title: Where did you learn to be so beautiful?
steps.content: Where did you learn to be so beautiful?

steps.title: How did you get such an amazing fashion sense? I need to know your secrets!
steps.content: How did you get such an amazing fashion sense? I need to know your secrets!

steps.title: Pretty, charming, and an absolute genius? How is there so much cool in one person?
steps.content: Pretty, charming, and an absolute genius? How is there so much cool in one person?

steps.title: Miss me yet? 😉
steps.content: Miss me yet? 😉

steps.title: Did you smile just now when you saw that I texted you?
steps.content: Did you smile just now when you saw that I texted you?

steps.title: When was the last time we talked? We have to change that.
steps.content: When was the last time we talked? We have to change that.

steps.title: In a single sentence, how would you define romance?
steps.content: In a single sentence, how would you define romance?

steps.title: Is there anything I can do to make you feel more special? 😘
steps.content: Is there anything I can do to make you feel more special? 😘

steps.title: What’s the perfect way to ask someone out?
steps.content: What’s the perfect way to ask someone out?

steps.title: What would you prefer to be called: sexy, adorable, or smart?
steps.content: What would you prefer to be called: sexy, adorable, or smart?

steps.title: What do marriage and commitment mean to you?
steps.content: What do marriage and commitment mean to you?

steps.title: What are the 3 things you value most in life?
steps.content: What are the 3 things you value most in life?

steps.title: What do you think is the best part of your personality?
steps.content: What do you think is the best part of your personality?

steps.title: Do you believe in second chances?
steps.content: Do you believe in second chances?

steps.title: In your opinion, what’s the key to making a relationship last?
steps.content: In your opinion, what’s the key to making a relationship last?

steps.title: Looking back, what have you done so far to give you the most satisfaction in your life?
steps.content: Looking back, what have you done so far to give you the most satisfaction in your life?

steps.title: Do you see yourself ever having kids?
steps.content: Do you see yourself ever having kids?

steps.title: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?
steps.content: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

steps.title: How do you define “soulmates”?
steps.content: How do you define “soulmates”?

steps.title: When do you think a person is ready for marriage?
steps.content: When do you think a person is ready for marriage?

steps.title: Are you more of an adventurer or homebody?
steps.content: Are you more of an adventurer or homebody?

steps.title: What do you wish you had more time for?
steps.content: What do you wish you had more time for?

steps.title: What is the healthiest and unhealthiest thing you do regularly?
steps.content: What is the healthiest and unhealthiest thing you do regularly?

steps.title: Who brings you the most joy in your life?
steps.content: Who brings you the most joy in your life?

steps.title: What book was a real game-changer for you?
steps.content: What book was a real game-changer for you?
